This is a selection of the most interesting presentations contributed by our members.

:::{.callout-tip}
## How to contribute

If you want to contribute, head on to the [GitHub repo](https://github.com/r-trento/r-trento.github.io){target="_blank"}, fork it, add a new post in the `slides` folder, tag it with the `slides` category and make a pull request. Use the `slides/_template.qmd` file to start.
:::
